transArray.content: Dear guest, thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and for recognizing the hotel environment. Your satisfaction is the driving force for our progress. Due to the long opening time of the hotel, there may be some deficiencies in various aspects. We have gradually updated it. The facilities in the room are provided for customers' use. We hope that we can do better under your supervision. At the same time, if you have any dissatisfaction during your stay, you can contact the front desk at any time. We will solve it for you in time and look forward to your visit again. Manager: Ji Hongjiao
